column4: Hello all. Does anyone know when you logout using TTY (ctrl+alt+f1) what the best way to log back in is? When I type "exit", sometimes I have to log back in again. Im on xubuntu 9.04 by the way..
I told you - no command - you didn't log out at all - you just switched to a so called "virtual terminal" - and you switch back witg alt+F7
